thread.title: Explosion hits Viransehir in Turkey's southeast | Turkey News
thread.title_full: Explosion hits Viransehir in Turkey's southeast | Turkey News | Al Jazeera

author: aljazeera.com
title: Explosion hits Viransehir in Turkey's southeast | Turkey News
text:
A three-year old child has been killed and 15 people have been wounded in a car bomb attack in a town in southeastern Turkey, near the border with Syria, according to a provincial governor and hospital sources.
Friday's explosion occurred near the lodgings of judges and prosecutors in Viransehir in Sanliurfa province, Turkey's private Dogan news agency reported.
Medics and police had been dispatched to the area, according to the report.
A witness told Reuters news agency the blast shattered windows in nearby buildings.
Source: News agencies
